reviewText: This is good clean, solid family entertainment, a true story of a pioneering family on the Oregon Trail. My wife and I loved it so much, that we purchased a second disc when the first was full of skipping etc. This is my warning, though, try to purchase a later rendition, Our first disc wasn't fully readable and was very frustrating. It has been released/issued several times, we bought a later version and are happy with that.
